name: FUN_GET_ORDER_NO_NEEDLE_SOCKS
body_snippet:
function FUN_GET_ORDER_NO_NEEDLE_SOCKS(PARM_SO_ID NUMBER) return varchar2 is
Result varchar2(10000);
 flag  number := 0;


begin

  for cur in (select     distinct  needle.segment_value_desc    Needle
  from
        sgd_stm_planning_mt          pm
       ,sgd_stm_planning_det         pd
       ,imk_so_mt                    so
       ,customer_mt                  cmt
       ,sgd_so_closing_mt            so_close
       ,wiz_segment03                b_col
       ,ssr_machine_size_mt          ms
       ,wiz_segment04                cust_size
       ,wiz_segment05                needle
       ,wiz_segment06                prog_no
       ,wiz_segment01                art
       ,ssr_fabric_terry_type_mt     fab

  ------------
     ,ssr_setup_receipe_mt rc
     ,ssr_process_side_mt  psm
     ,ssr_linking_type_mt  lt

   where pm.imk_so_id            = so.so_id
   and so.so_id                  = so_close.imk_so_id(+)
   and so_close.imk_so_id is null
   and so.customer_id            = cmt.customer_id
   and pd.stm_planning_id        = pm.stm_planning_id
   and pd.machine_size_id        = ms.machine_size_id(+)
   and pd.wiz_segment03_id       = b_col.segment_id(+)
   and pd.structure_id_bs        = b_col.structure_id(+)
   and pd.wiz_segment04_id       = cust_size.segment_id(+)
   and pd.structure_id_bs        = cust_size.structure_id(+)
   and pd.PROCESS_RECIPE_ID      = rc.receipe_id(+)
   and pd.process_side_id        = psm.process_side_id(+)
   and pd.bi_link_type_id        = lt
